analyzed: mañjuśrī kumāra bhūtāya namaḥ
sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca eva sa ābhāsam para saṃvide
pratyakṣam anumānam ca sa ābhāsam tu ātma saṃvide
ayam śāstra artha rāṃgrahaḥ
vādinā svayam sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ rthaḥ sādhyaḥ
yena sādhyate tat sādhanam
hetoḥ trairūpyam ucyate
kim punar tat trairūpyam
pakṣe sattvam eva prathamam rūpam
sapakṣaḥ eva sattvam iti dvitīyam rūpam

original: vipakṣe ca asattvameva niścitamiti tṛtīyaṃ rūpam //
analyzed: vipakṣe ca asattvam eva niścitam iti tṛtīyam rūpam

original: 4. tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddhaviśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣādyaviruddhaḥ /
analyzed: tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddhaḥ dharmī prasiddha viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svayam sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ pratyakṣa ādi aviruddhaḥ

original: yathā dharmī śabdo 'nitya iti viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyaḥ /
analyzed: yathā dharmī śabdaḥ nityaḥ iti viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyaḥ
kṛtaka tvāt iti hetuḥ bhavati iti
kaḥ punar sapakṣaḥ
sādhya dharma sāmānyena samānaḥ sapakṣaḥ
yathā ghaṭa ādiḥ iti
kaḥ hetoḥ vipakṣaḥ
yatra sādhya abhāvāt hetu abhāvaḥ niścayena pradarśyate
yathā ākāśa ādiḥ
trirūpa hetu pradarśanena para avagama nimittam kṛtaḥ prayogaḥ parārtha anumānam iti ucyate
yathā śabdaḥ nityaḥ iti pakṣa vacanam
kṛtaka tvāt iti hetu vacanam
ghaṭa ādi vat iti sapakṣa vacanam
ākāśa ādi vat iti vipakṣa vacanam
sa punar dvividhaḥ dṛśyate
sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca
tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvat
yat kṛtakam tat sarvam anityam dṛṣṭam
ghaṭa ādiḥ
śabdaḥ api kṛtakaḥ iti
vaidharmyeṇa api anitya tva abhāve kṛtaka tva abhāvaḥ
yathā ākāśa ādiḥ
śabdaḥ tu kṛtakaḥ iti
kaḥ punar pakṣa ābhāsaḥ
pakṣa ābhāsaḥ vastutas na pakṣaḥ
pratyakṣa ādi virodhāt ayam pakṣa ābhāsaḥ

original: 12. yathā dhūmādirdharmī buddhimaddhetūtpannaḥ sādhya iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ pakṣābhāsaḥ /
analyzed: yathā dhūma ādiḥ dharmī buddhimat hetu utpannaḥ sādhyaḥ iti pratyakṣa viruddhaḥ pakṣābhāsaḥ
pratyakṣataḥ vahneḥ dhūma utpatti darśanāt
anumāna viruddhaḥ yathā

original: vedavacanaṃ dharmyapauruṣeyamiti sādhye śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyaka iti pauruṣeyatvasya siddheḥ //
analyzed: veda vacanam dharmya pauruṣeyam iti sādhye śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ iti pauruṣeya tvasya siddheḥ
sva vacana viruddhaḥ yathā
anumānam na pramāṇam iti
para avagamāya vākya prayogaḥ para artha anumānam iti nirdeśāt
loka viruddhaḥ yathā
śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam prāṇi aṅga tvāt śaṅkha śukti vat iti
pratīti viruddhaḥ yathā
yat yāvatkālasthāyi tat anityam
yat yāvatkālasthāyi tat sarvam nityam iti laukika pratīteḥ
aprasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ yathā
vaiśeṣikasya sāṃkhyam prati śabdaḥ vināśi iti
aprasiddha viśeṣyaḥ yathā

original: sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ pratyātmā cetana iti sādhyam //
analyzed: sāṃkhyasya bauddham prati ātmā cetanaḥ iti sādhyam
aprasiddha ubhayaḥ yathā

original: vaiśeṣikasya bauddhaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇamātmeti kāyaḥ sthirasvabhāva iti vā //
analyzed: vaiśeṣikasya bauddham prati samavāyi kāraṇam ātmā iti kāyaḥ sthira svabhāvaḥ iti vā
pakṣa ābhāsāḥ uktāḥ
kīdṛśaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ

original: yo heturivābhāsate na tu hetutvena sidhyati //
analyzed: yaḥ hetuḥ iva ābhāsate na tu hetu tvena sidhyati
hetvābhāsaḥ trividhaḥ
asiddhaḥ viruddhaḥ na aikāntikaḥ ca
tatra pakṣa asiddheḥ asiddhaḥ iti hetvābhāsaḥ

original: 24. pakṣe sapakṣe cāsan vipakṣe ca san yaḥ sa viruddha iti hetvābhāsaḥ sādhyaviparītasiddheḥ //
analyzed: pakṣe sapakṣe ca asān vipakṣe ca san yaḥ sa viruddhaḥ iti hetvābhāsaḥ sādhya viparīta siddheḥ

original: 25. sapakṣavipakṣayorubhayorbhāve 'bhāve vā saṃśaye vāsiddhapratibandho yo hetuḥ so 'naikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ /
analyzed: sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ ubhayoḥ bhāve bhāve vā saṃśaye vā asiddha pratibandhaḥ yaḥ hetuḥ saḥ na aikāntikaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ
vādi prativādibhyām sādhayitum iṣṭasya ekāntena asiddheḥ
ubhaya asiddhaḥ yathā
śabdasya anitya tve sādhye hetuḥ cākṣuṣa tvam vādi prativādinoḥ asiddhaḥ iti

original: 27. cetanastaruriti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇāditi hetuḥ prativādinaṃ bauddhaṃ pratyasiddha iti prativādyasiddhaścittādinirodhasya bauddhasyeṣṭatvāt
analyzed: cetanaḥ taruḥ iti sādhye sarva tvac apaharaṇe maraṇāt iti hetuḥ prativādinam bauddham prati asiddhaḥ iti prativādi asiddhaḥ citta ādi nirodhasya bauddhasya iṣṭa tvāt

original: 28. acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti sādhye utpattimattvāditi hetuḥ sāṃkhyasya svayaṃ vādino 'siddha iti vādyasiddhaḥ //
analyzed: acetanāḥ sukha ādayaḥ iti sādhye utpattimat tvāt iti hetuḥ sāṃkhyasya svayam vādinaḥ siddhaḥ iti vādi asiddhaḥ

original: 29. vaiśeṣikeṇa prativādinaṃ bauddhaṃ prati pṛthivyādirdharmī kārya iti sādhya ekaikakṣaṇavadanyānyotpādāditi vādinaḥ svayamasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: vaiśeṣikeṇa prativādinam bauddham prati pṛthivī ādiḥ dharmī kāryaḥ iti sādhyaḥ ekaika kṣaṇa vat anya anya utpādāt iti vādinaḥ svayam asiddhaḥ
siddhe pi utpāde ekaika kṣaṇa vat anya anya utpāda asiddheḥ
pakṣa eka deśa asiddhaḥ yathā

original: cetanāstaravaḥ svāpāditi hetuścandane vādinaḥ svayaṃ pakṣaikadeśe 'siddhaḥ /
analyzed: cetanāḥ taravaḥ svāpāt iti hetuḥ candane vādinaḥ svayam pakṣa eka deśe siddhaḥ

original: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṃkocabhājaḥ //
analyzed: na hi sarve vṛkṣāḥ rātrau patra saṃkoca bhājaḥ

original: 31. evameva kṣityādirgharmī buddhimajjāta iti sādhye kāryamiti heturbauddhaṃ pratyasiddhaḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇasambandhasiddhasvarūpeṇa  #
analyzed: evam eva kṣiti ādiḥ gharmī buddhimat jātaḥ iti sādhye kāryam iti hetuḥ bauddham prati asiddhaḥ pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām kārya kāraṇa sambandha siddha svarūpeṇa
kṣiti ādīnām siddheḥ
vāsa bhojana ādi siddhiḥ iti ced tadā pakṣa eka deśa asiddhiḥ
saṃdigdha asiddhaḥ yathā

original: yadīha dhūmaḥ syādatra vahniḥ syāditi sādhye hetvaniścayāt //
analyzed: yadi iha dhūmaḥ syāt atra vahniḥ syāt iti sādhye hetu aniścayāt
saṃdigdha dharmya siddhaḥ yathā

original: eṣvanekeṣu nikuñjeṣu kasmiṃścin nikuñje mayūra iti sādhye kekāyitāditi heturiti //
analyzed: eṣu anekeṣu nikuñjeṣu kasmiṃścid nikuñje mayūraḥ iti sādhye kekāyitāt iti hetuḥ iti
dharmya siddhau api asiddhaḥ yathā
dharmya ātmā sarva vyāpī iti sādhye sarvatra upalabhyamāna guṇa tvāt iti hetuḥ iti
navā ete siddhāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ
kīdṛśaḥ punar anaikāntikaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ ucyate

original: 37. yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatra varttamānaḥ sādhāraṇo 'naikāntika iti //
analyzed: yathā śabdasya nitya tva ādike dharme sādhye prameya tvāt iti hetuḥ sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ sarvatra varttamānaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ na aikāntikaḥ iti

original: 38. evaṃ śabdo nitya iti sādhye śrāvaṇatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe cāvṛtterasādhāraṇo 'naikāntikaḥ //
analyzed: evam śabdaḥ nityaḥ iti sādhye śrāvaṇa tvāt iti hetuḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca avṛtteḥ asādhāraṇaḥ na aikāntikaḥ

original: 39. evaṃ śabdasyāprayatnānantarīyakatve sādhye 'nityatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣaikadeśavṛtti rvipakṣavyāpyanaikāntikaḥ /
analyzed: evam śabdasya aprayatna ānantarīyaka tve sādhye nitya tvāt iti hetuḥ sapakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ rvipakṣa vyāpi anaikāntikaḥ
a prayatna ānantarīyakasya śabdasya sapakṣaḥ vidyut ākāśa ādiḥ
tatra sapakṣa eka deśe vidyut ādau anitya tvam varttate
na ākāśa ādau
vipakṣāḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka ādayaḥ sarve
teṣu sarveṣu asti

original: 40. evaṃ śabdasya prayatnānantīyakatve sādhye 'nityatvāditi hetu rghaṭādau sarvatra vidyate /
analyzed: evam śabdasya prayatna ānantīyaka tve sādhye nitya tvāt iti hetuḥ r ghaṭa ādau sarvatra vidyate
aprayatna ānantarīyakaḥ vipakṣaḥ punar vidyut ākāśa ādiḥ
tatra eka deśe vidyut ādau varttate na ākāśa ādau
tasmāt ayam vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ sapakṣa vyāpi anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ
ubhaya pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ anaikāntikaḥ yathā

original: dharmī śabdo nitya iti sādhye 'mūrttatvāditi hetuḥ /
analyzed: dharmī śabdaḥ nityaḥ iti sādhye mūrtta tvāt iti hetuḥ
paramāṇu ākāśa ādiḥ sapakṣaḥ

original: tatra sapakṣaikadeśa ākāśe 'mūrttatvaṃ vidyate na paramāṇau paramāṇūnāṃ mūrttatvāt /
analyzed: tatra sapakṣa eka deśe ākāśe mūrtta tvam vidyate na paramāṇau paramāṇūnām mūrtta tvāt
ghaṭa sukha ādiḥ anityaḥ vipakṣaḥ
tad eka deśe sukha ādau vidyate na ghaṭa ādau iti
evam saṃdigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ sapakṣa vyāpi anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ yathā

original: kapilādi rdharmyasarvajña iti sādhye vaktṛtvāditi hetū rathyāpuruṣādau sapakṣe vidyate vipakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ /
analyzed: kapila ādiḥ dharmya sarvajñaḥ iti sādhye vaktṛ tvāt iti hetuḥ rathyā puruṣa ādau sapakṣe vidyate vipakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ
sarvajñasya atīndriya tvāt vaktṛ tvam asti na vā iti saṃdehaḥ
evam saṃdigdha sapakṣa vṛttiḥ vipakṣa vyāpi anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ yathā

original: ṛṣabhavardhamānādi rdharmī sarvajña iti sādhye kevalaśāstrakarttṛtvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣabha vardhamāna ādiḥ dharmī sarvajñaḥ iti sādhye kevala śāstra karttṛ tvāt iti hetuḥ sapakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ
sarvajñasya atīndriya tvāt kevala śāstra karttari saṃdehaḥ
vipakṣe ādau asarvajñe sti iti
anvaya vyatirekayoḥ saṃdehe na aikāntikaḥ hetuḥ yathā
jīvat śarīram sātmakam prāṇa ādima tvāt iti hetuḥ

original: jīvaccharīrasambandhī prāṇādiḥ sātmake nirātmake vā varttamāno vyāvṛtto vetyaniścayaḥ //
analyzed: jīvat śarīra sambandhī prāṇa ādiḥ sātmake nirātmake vā varttamānaḥ vyāvṛttaḥ vā iti aniścayaḥ
tatas kevala anvayī hetuḥ dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt
evam dvitīyaḥ pi kevala vyatirekī
jīvat śarīram idam na nirātmakam prāṇa ādi abhāva prasaṅgāt iti

original: dṛṣṭāntābhāvādanvayasyāniścayo vyatirekasya ca niścaya ityayaṃ saṃdigdho hetuḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt anvayasya aniścayaḥ vyatirekasya ca niścayaḥ iti ayam saṃdigdhaḥ hetuḥ
ete daśa anaikāntika hetvābhāsāḥ udāhṛtāḥ
viruddhāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ kīdṛśāḥ

original: 49. yathā dharmī śabdo nitya iti sādhyadharmaḥ /
analyzed: yathā dharmī śabdaḥ nityaḥ iti sādhya dharmaḥ

original: kṛtakatvādākāśādivadityayaṃ heturghaṭādau vipakṣa eva vidyate na sapakṣe //
analyzed: kṛtaka tvāt ākāśa ādi vat iti ayam hetuḥ ghaṭa ādau vipakṣe eva vidyate na sapakṣe

original: 50. evaṃ dharmī śabdo nitya iti sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣa ākāśādau nāsti ghaṭādāvekadeśe 'sti vidyudādau nāstīti /
analyzed: evam dharmī śabdaḥ nityaḥ iti sādhye prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt iti hetuḥ sapakṣe ākāśa ādau na asti ghaṭa ādau eka deśe sti vidyut ādau na asti iti
imau dvau hetū dharma svarūpa viparīta sādhanau

original: ete cakṣurādayaḥ parārthā iti sādhyadharmaḥ saṃghātatvāditi hetuḥ śayanāsanādivaditi sapakṣanirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: ete cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ para arthāḥ iti sādhya dharmaḥ saṃghāta tvāt iti hetuḥ śayana āsana ādi vat iti sapakṣa nirdeśaḥ

original: ayaṃ heturyathā cakṣurādeḥ pārārthyaṃ sādhayati tathā saṃhatatvamapi parasya sādhayati /
analyzed: ayam hetuḥ yathā cakṣuḥ ādeḥ pārārthyam sādhayati tathā saṃhata tvam api parasya sādhayati
śayana āsana ādeḥ saṃhata devadatta ādi parārtha tva darśanāt
dharmi svarūpa viparīta sādhanaḥ yathā

original: dharmyādirbuddhimataḥ kāraṇādutpadyata iti sādhye sāśratvāditi hetuḥ /
analyzed: dharmya ādiḥ buddhimataḥ kāraṇāt utpadyate iti sādhye sāśra tvāt iti hetuḥ
ghaṭa ādi vat iti sapakṣa nirdeśaḥ

original: yathānena hetunā buddhimaddhetuto jātatvaṃ sādhyate tathā buddhimatkarttuḥ sāśrayatvamapi sādhyate //
analyzed: yathā anena hetunā buddhimat hetutaḥ jāta tvam sādhyate tathā buddhimat karttuḥ sāśraya tvam api sādhyate
dharmi viśeṣa viparīta sādhanaḥ yathā

original: vaiśeṣikeṇa yogācāraṃ prati dharmyātmā cetanā iti sādhye vijñānādhiṣṭhānāditi hetu ryathācetanamātmānaṃ cetanaṃ sādhayati tathāyaṃ heturanityamapi  #
analyzed: vaiśeṣikeṇa yoga ācāram prati dharmya ātmā cetanā iti sādhye vijñāna adhiṣṭhānāt iti hetuḥ yathā acetanam ātmānam cetanam sādhayati tathā ayam hetuḥ anityam api
sādhayati vijñānasya anitya tvāt
pañcabhiḥ etaiḥ viruddhāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ pradarśitāḥ

original: 55. viruddhāvyabhicārī kutrāpi hetudoṣo na bhavatīti tasyodāharaṇopanyāso na yuktaḥ /
analyzed: viruddha avyabhicārī kutra api hetu doṣaḥ na bhavati iti tasya udāharaṇa upanyāsaḥ na yuktaḥ
udāharaṇam ucyate ced
yat sarva deśa avasthitaiḥ sva sambandhibhiḥ yugapad abhisambadhyate tat sarvagatam
yathākāśam
sarva deśa avasthitaiḥ sva sambandhibhiḥ yugapad sāmānyam abhisambaddham iti pailukasya svabhāva hetu prayogaḥ
dvitīyaḥ pi prayogaḥ paiṭharasya

original: yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sadyatra nopalabhyate na tat tatra asti /
analyzed: yat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sat yatra na upalabhyate na tat tatra asti
tat yathā kasmiṃścid deśe vidyamānaḥ ghaṭaḥ
na upalabhyate ca upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sāmānyam vyakti antarāleṣu iti
ayam anupalambha hetuḥ pūrva uktaḥ ca svabhāva hetuḥ
anayoḥ paraspara virodhena saṃśaya janaka tvāt

original: sapakṣādanyo dṛṣṭānto na kaścidastīti sapakṣa evāyaṃ sādharmyeṇa dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
analyzed: sapakṣāt anyaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ na kaścid asti iti sapakṣaḥ eva ayam sādharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhavati
tatra kīdṛśāḥ dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ
sādharmyeṇa tāvat
nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrtta tvāt karma vat iti sādhya vikalaḥ karmaṇaḥ nitya tvāt
nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrtta tvāt paramāṇu vat iti sādhana vikalaḥ paramāṇoḥ mūrtta tvāt
nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrtta tvāt dhaṭa vat iti sādhya sādhana vikalaḥ
evam saṃdigdha sādhya dharmaḥ dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaḥ yathā
dharmī puruṣaḥ kaścid rāga ādimān vacanāt rathyā puruṣa vat iti
rathyā puruṣa dṛṣṭānte rāga ādimattvam saṃdigdham
para citta anumānasya duṣkara tvāt
saṃdigdha sādhana dharmaḥ yathā

original: maraṇadharmā puruṣa iti sādhye rāgādimattvāditi hetū rathyāpuruṣadṛṣṭānte saṃdigdhaḥ /
analyzed: maraṇa dharmā puruṣaḥ iti sādhye rāga ādimat tvāt iti hetuḥ rathyā puruṣa dṛṣṭānte saṃdigdhaḥ
vīta rāgasya api sa rāga vat cala tvāt
saṃdigdha ubhaya dharmaḥ dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaḥ yathā

original: dharmī kaścit puruṣaḥ asarvajña iti sādhye rāgādimattvāditi hetuḥ /
analyzed: dharmī kaścid puruṣaḥ asarvajñaḥ iti sādhye rāga ādimat tvāt iti hetuḥ
rathyā puruṣa dṛṣṭānte sādhyam sādhanam ca saṃdigdham
pradarśita anvayaḥ viparīta anvayaḥ ca dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ
tatra ananvayaḥ yathā
yaḥ vaktā sa rāga ādimān rathyā puruṣa vat
vaktṛ tva rāga ādimat tvayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratiṣedhāt
apradarśita anvayaḥ yathā
anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti
atra anvayavyāptiḥ apradarśi tā
vaktṛ doṣāt ayam dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaḥ
viparīta anvayaḥ yathā
yat anityam tat kṛtakam iti
ghaṭa ādi vat iti
atra anitya tvam sādhyam

original: sādhyena sādhanasya vyāptirdarśanīyā sādhanena tu sādhyasya vyāptirdarśitā /
analyzed: sādhyena sādhanasya vyāptiḥ darśanīyā sādhanena tu sādhyasya vyāptiḥ darśitā
sādharmyeṇa ete nava dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ uktāḥ
vaidharmyeṇa dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ ucyante
sādhya avyāvṛttaḥ dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaḥ yathā
nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrtta tvāt paramāṇu vat iti

original: iha paramāṇurvaidharmyadṛṣṭānta iti sādhanadharmo 'mūrttatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ mūrttatvātparamāṇunām /
analyzed: iha paramāṇuḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭānte iti sādhana dharmaḥ mūrtta tvam vyāvṛttam mūrtta tvāt paramāṇunām
sādhya dharmaḥ nitya tvam na vyāvṛttam nitya tvāt paramāṇunām iti
sādhana avyāvṛttaḥ yathā
nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrtta tvāt karma vat iti

original: iha sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ karmaṇo 'nityatvāt sādhanadharmo na vyāvṛtto 'mūrttatvātkarmaṇaḥ //
analyzed: iha sādhya dharmaḥ nitya tvam vyāvṛttam karmaṇaḥ nitya tvāt sādhana dharmaḥ na vyāvṛttaḥ mūrtta tvāt karmaṇaḥ
ubhaya a vyāvṛttaḥ yathā
nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrtta tvāt ākāśa ādi vat iti

original: atrākāśādervaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāt sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca na vyāvṛttam //
analyzed: atra ākāśa ādeḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntāt sādhyam sādhanam ca na vyāvṛttam
tathā saṃdigdha sādhya vyatirekaḥ saṃdigdha sādhana vyatirekaḥ saṃdigdha ubhaya vyatirekaḥ ca
saṃdigdha sādhya vyatirekaḥ dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaḥ yathā
asarvajñāḥ kapila ādayaḥ vidyamāna sarvajña tā liṅga bhūta kevala śāstra karttṛ tvāt iti
atra vaidharmyeṇa udāharaṇam ucyate
yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa jyotiḥ jñāna ādikam upadiṣṭavān
tat yathā ṛṣabha varddhamāna ādiḥ iti

original: iha vaidharmyodāharaṇa ukta ṛṣabhavardhamānāderasarvajñatvaṃ vyāvṛttamavyāvṛttaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ //
analyzed: iha vaidharmya udāharaṇe ukte ṛṣabha vardhamāna ādeḥ asarvajña tvam vyāvṛttam avyāvṛttam vā iti saṃdehaḥ
saṃdigdha sādhana vyatirekaḥ yathā

original: iha trayīvidā brāhmaṇena kapilakaṇādādiḥ puruṣo na grāhyavacano rāgādimattvāditi /
analyzed: iha trayī vidā brāhmaṇena kapila kaṇāda ādiḥ puruṣaḥ na grāhya vacanaḥ rāga ādimat tvāt iti

original: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇamucyate yo grāhyavacano na sa rāgādimān yathā gotamādayaḥ dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāra iti /
analyzed: atra vaidharmya udāharaṇam ucyate yaḥ grāhya vacanaḥ na sa rāga ādimān yathā gotama ādayaḥ dharma śāstrāṇām praṇetāraḥ iti
gotama ādibhyaḥ rāga ādima tvasya sādhana dharmasya vyāvṛttiḥ saṃdigdhā
saṃdigdha ubhaya vyatirekaḥ yathā
a vīta rāgāḥ kapila ādayaḥ parigraha agraha yogāt iti
atra vaidharmyeṇa udāharaṇam ucyate

original: yo vītarāgaḥ sa na parigrahāgrahavān yathā ṛṣabhavarddhemānādiriti /
analyzed: yaḥ vīta rāgaḥ sa na parigraha agrahavān yathā

original: ṛṣabhādeḥ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntād vītarāgatvaparigrahāgrahayoḥ sādhyasādhanadharmayorvyatireko 'vyatireko veti saṃdehaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣabha ādeḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntāt vīta rāga tva parigraha agrahayoḥ sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ vyatirekaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā iti saṃdehaḥ
prāk a labdhasya vastunaḥ lābhaḥ parigrahaḥ labdhasya a parivarjanam āgrahaḥ
ubhayoḥ api tayoḥ rṛṣabhe sambhavaḥ
chatra cāmara mahā dundubhīnām parigraha āgraha śravaṇāt
avyatirekaḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaḥ pradarśita vyatirekaḥ viparīta vyatirekaḥ ca iti
avyatirekaḥ yathā
kapila ādiḥ avīta rāgaḥ vaktṛ tvāt

original: yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti /
analyzed: yatra avīta rāga tvam na asti na sa vaktā yathā upala khaṇḍaḥ iti

original: yadyapīdamupalakhaṇḍādvyāvṛttaṃ tathāpi sarvasmādvītarāgādvaktṛtvaṃ na vyāvṛttaṃ sandehāt //
analyzed: yadi api idam upala khaṇḍāt vyāvṛttam tathā api sarvasmāt vīta rāgāt vaktṛ tvam na vyāvṛttam sandehāt
apradarśita vyatirekaḥ yathā
anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ākāśa ādi vat iti
paramārthataḥ samyak udāhṛtaḥ vaktuḥ aparādhāt dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaḥ
parārtha anumāne vaktuḥ guṇa doṣayoḥ dvayoḥ vicāraṇīya tvāt

original: evaṃ yannityaṃ tatsarvaṃ niyatamakṛtakaṃ dṛśyate yathākāśādiriti vāgvibhāgo vaktrā karttavyaḥ /
analyzed: evam yat nityam tat sarvam niyatam akṛtakam dṛśyate yathā ākāśa ādiḥ iti vāc vibhāgaḥ vaktrā karttavyaḥ
pūrva varttinaḥ vyatirekasya apradarśanāt apradarśita vyatirekaḥ
viparīta vyatirekaḥ yathā
yat akṛtakam tat nityam dṛṣṭam iti
iha tu sādhya viparīte vyāptiḥ darśanīyā
tena yat yat sādhya viparītam tat tat niyatam sādhana viparītam bhavet
aṣṭādaśa dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ uktāḥ
ebhiḥ eva pakṣa hetu dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaiḥ vādinā sādhanasya avyutpatteḥ prativādī dūṣaṇam upanyasyati
tasya dūṣaṇasya pūrvapakṣa vādinaḥ bhīṣṭa artha siddhau pratibandhaka tvāt sādhana nyūna tā udbhāvanam eva dūṣaṇam ucyate
tasmāt sādhanavat dūṣaṇa lakṣaṇa vibhagāḥ pṛthak na uktaḥ
dūṣaṇa ābhāsaḥ dūṣaṇam eva iti sa prativādinā ucyate

original: yadā pūrvapakṣavādino 'bhūtaṃ doṣamudbhāvayati tadā sa dūṣaṇābhāso jātiriti /
analyzed: yadā pūrvapakṣa vādinaḥ bhūtam doṣam udbhāvayati tadā sa dūṣaṇa ābhāsaḥ jātiḥ iti
abhūta doṣa udbhāvanam viparīta uttaram jātiḥ iti ucyate

original: yathā pakṣadoṣābhāve pakṣadoṣodbhāvanaṃ hetudoṣābhāve hetudoṣodbhāvanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadoṣābhāve ca dṛṣṭāntadoṣodbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇābhāsa iti //
analyzed: yathā pakṣa doṣa abhāve pakṣa doṣa udbhāvanam hetu doṣa abhāve hetu doṣa udbhāvanam dṛṣṭānta doṣa abhāve ca dṛṣṭānta doṣa udbhāvanam dūṣaṇa ābhāse iti
tatra āhuḥ anye

original: pratijñā hetuḥ udāharaṇam upanayaḥ nigamanaṃ ceti pañcāvayavaṃ sādhanamiti /
analyzed: pratijñā hetuḥ udāharaṇam upanayaḥ nigamanam ca iti pañca avayavam sādhanam iti
yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñā
kṛtaka tvāt iti hetuḥ

original: yatkṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādirityudāharaṇam /
analyzed: yat kṛtakam sarvam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādiḥ iti udāharaṇam
tathā śabdaḥ api kṛtakaḥ iti upanayaḥ
tasmāt anityaḥ iti nigamanam
dṛṣṭānta pratīta sāmarthyasya hetoḥ dharmiṇī upasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ iti
pratijñāyā punar śravaṇam nigamanam iti ucyate
mā evam anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ ca iti trayeṇa eva sādhya artha siddheḥ
evam vāda kāle vyāpti pūrvakaḥ eva prayogaḥ

original: yatkṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādhanayorvyāptipratipādanamanvaya ityucyate //
analyzed: yat kṛtakam sarvam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādiḥ iti dṛṣṭānte sādhya sādhanayoḥ vyāpti pratipādanam anvayaḥ iti ucyate
vipakṣe punar sādhya vyāvṛttyā sādhana vyāvṛttiḥ vyatirekaḥ iti ucyate
yathā anitya tva abhāve kṛtaka tva abhāvaḥ syāt yathā ākāśa ādiḥ
śabdaḥ api kṛtakaḥ iti pakṣa dharmaḥ ucyate

original: pratijñā nigamanaṃ ca sarvathā na vaktavye //
analyzed: pratijñā nigamanam ca sarvathā na vaktavye
tathā sādharmya prayoge nvaya vacana sāmarthyāt vyatireka avagamāt ayam pṛthak nā ucyate

original: yathā yatkṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiḥ śabdo 'pi kṛtaka iti sādharmyaprayogaḥ /
analyzed: yathā yat kṛtakam sarvam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādiḥ śabdaḥ api kṛtakaḥ iti sādharmya prayogaḥ
vaidharmya prayoge vyatireka vacana sāmarthyāt anvaya pratītiḥ
atra punar anvayaḥ na vācyaḥ

original: yannityaṃ tadakṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśādiḥ śabdastu kṛtaka iti vaidharmyaprayogaḥ //
analyzed: yat nityam tat akṛtakam dṛṣṭam yathā ākāśa ādiḥ śabdaḥ tu kṛtakaḥ iti vaidharmya prayogaḥ
sādhana ābhāsaḥ dūṣaṇa ābhāsaḥ ca uktaḥ
kim nāma pratyakṣam iti
pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham abhrāntam
akṣam pratigatam āśritam yat vijñānam tat pratyakṣam
pañca indriya āśritam jñānam iti arthaḥ

original: atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitīyayeti samāsenābhidheyaliṅgaḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ siddhaḥ /
analyzed: ati ādayaḥ krānta ādi arthe dvitīyayā iti samāsena abhidheya liṅgaḥ pratyakṣa śabdaḥ siddhaḥ

original: pratyakṣo 'vabodhaḥ pratyakṣā buddhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ ceti yuktaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: pratyakṣaḥ vai bodhaḥ pratyakṣā buddhiḥ pratyakṣam jñānam ca iti yuktam bhavati

original: 91. cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ nāsikā jihvā kāyaśceti pañcendriyāṇi /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ śrotram nāsikā jihvā kāyaḥ ca iti pañca indriyāṇi

original: tadāśritasya jñānasya pañca grāhyaviṣayā rūpaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyañceti pañcaiva prameyāṇi //
analyzed: tad āśritasya jñānasya pañca grāhya viṣayāḥ rūpam śabdaḥ gandhaḥ rasaḥ spraṣṭavyam ca iti pañca eva prameyāṇi

original: 92. tacca pratyakṣaṃ nāmajātyādikalpanāpoḍhaṃ nirvikalpaṃ vā yadi punarabhrāntaṃ pramāṇamucyate pradarśitārthe 'visaṃvādāt /
analyzed: tat ca pratyakṣam nāma jāti ādi kalpanā apoḍham nirvikalpam vā yadi punar abhrāntam pramāṇam ucyate pradarśita arthe visaṃvādāt
tatra nāma vikalpaḥ devadattaḥ yam iti jñānam
jāti vikalpaḥ yam gauḥ iti jñānam
viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa vikalpaḥ nīlam utpalam iti
anyaḥ pi sa vikalpaḥ pratyakṣa ābhāsaḥ
vidyamāne rthe vibhramaḥ taimirikasya dvi candra jñānam
śuktau rajata jñānam

original: ayaṃ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti jñānaṃ ca /
analyzed: ayam sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti jñānam ca
jñāna antaram api pratyakṣa ābhāsaḥ pradarśita artha a prāpaka tvāt
tatra pratyakṣam trividham

original: vyāvahārikamindriyajñānaṃ sarvacittacaittānāmātmasaṃvedanaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ bhūtārthabhāvanāsphuṭaprakarṣaparyantajaṃ yogijñānaṃ ceti //
analyzed: vyāvahārikam indriya jñānam sarva citta caittānām ātma saṃvedanam sva saṃvedanam bhūta artha bhāvanā sphuṭa prakarṣa paryanta jam yogi jñānam ca iti
tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam
arthakriyā samartham sva lakṣaṇam
na sāmānyam arthakriyā samartham
tat eva ca pratyakṣam pramāṇam artha pratīti rūpa tvāt phalam api
tathātvena ca pramāṇa phalayoḥ na manāk api bhedaḥ
dvividham anumānam sva artham para artham ca

original: 98. tatra svārthaṃ tāvat pakṣadharmagrahaṇāt sādhyasādhanasambandhasmṛteḥ paścāt pratipatturarthasya yathāvadyā pratītistadeva svārthānumānam
analyzed: tatra svārtham tāvat pakṣa dharma grahaṇāt sādhya sādhana sambandha smṛteḥ paścāt pratipattuḥ arthasya yathāvat yā pratītiḥ tat eva svārtha anumānam
pakṣa dharmaḥ tri prakāraḥ eva kāryam svabhāvaḥ nupalabdhiḥ ca
kārya kāraṇa siddhau kāryam hetuḥ iti

original: yathā yatna dhūmaḥ tatra agniryathā mahānasādau /
analyzed: yathā dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ yathā mahānasa ādau
atra api dhūma sadbhāvāt iti

original: agnyabhāve dhūmābhāvo yathā sajale deśa iti atra tu dhūmāditi //
analyzed: agni abhāve dhūma abhāvaḥ yathā sa jale deśe iti atra tu dhūmāt iti
svabhāvaḥ hetuḥ
vṛkṣaḥ yam śiṃśapā tvāt pūrva vyavahāra āpanna śiṃśapā vat
vṛkṣa abhāve śiṃśapā abhāvaḥ yathā vṛkṣa rahite pradeśe

original: iha punastena vyāpakena rūpeṇa vyāpyo hetuḥ //
analyzed: iha punar tena vyāpakena rūpeṇa vyāpyaḥ hetuḥ
anupalabdhi hetuḥ
atra ghaṭaḥ na astu upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdheḥ śaśaviṣāṇa ādi vat
atra api yadā upalabdhi yogya anupalabdhau upalabdhi yogya abhāva vyāptiḥ niścīyate tadā ayam hetuḥ tad pratipādakaḥ bhavati
kīdṛśāḥ anumāna ābhāsāḥ
pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ca para kalpitāni sarvāṇi anumānāni anumāna ābhāsāḥ
teṣām tādātmya tu utpatti lakṣaṇena pratibandha abhāvāt

original: hetuphalasambandhe vyāpyavyāpakasambandhe ca siddhe sādhyasādhanasambandho bhavati nānyathā visaṃvādakatvāt //
analyzed: hetu phala sambandhe vyāpya vyāpaka sambandhe ca siddhe sādhya sādhana sambandhaḥ bhavati na anyathā visaṃvādaka tvāt
yathā meghaḥ yam vṛṣṭimān dṛśyate
gambhīra nirghoṣavat tvāt iti atra gambhīra ghoṣavataḥ meghāt vṛṣṭi anudbhava sambhavāt
yathā upariṣṭāt vṛṣṭam nadī vṛddhi darśanāt iti
nadī nirodhāt api nadī vṛddhi darśanāt
evam ime taṇḍulāḥ siddhāḥ eka pātra madhya varti tvāt dṛṣṭa taṇḍula vat

original: 107. imāni phalāni pakvānyekaśākhāto jātatvādbhuktaphalavadityatra prāyeṇaivaṃ dṛṣṭe 'pi sādhyasādhanayorvisaṃvāda eva //
analyzed: imāni phalāni pakvāni eka śākhātaḥ jāta tvāt bhukta phala vat iti atra prāyeṇa evam dṛṣṭe sādhya sādhanayoḥ visaṃvādaḥ eva

original: 108. yatpārthivaṃ tatsarvaṃ lohalekhyaṃ dṛśyate yathā vṛkṣādaya iti /
analyzed: yat pārthivam tat sarvam loha lekhyam dṛśyate yathā vṛkṣa ādayaḥ iti
atra vajraḥ pi pārthivaḥ

original: 109. ye prāṇinaste sarve sakandharā yathoṣṭrādaya iti /
analyzed: ye prāṇinaḥ te sarve sa kandharāḥ yathā uṣṭra ādayaḥ iti
atra kulīraḥ pi prāṇī
yat drava dravyam tat ārdram dṛśyate yathā jalam iti
atra drava dravyam
evam anye pi anumāna ābhāsāḥ dṛśyante
iti paṇḍita pravara jitāri pāda kṛtaḥ hetutattvopadeśaḥ sampūrṇaḥ

original: bhāratīyopādhyāyena paṇḍitena kumārakalasena bhāṣāntarakārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā śākyaprabheṇa ca bhoṭabhāṣāyāṃ vipariṇamayya saṃśodhya ca vinyastaḥ
analyzed: bhāratīya upādhyāyena paṇḍitena kumārakalasena bhāṣā antara kārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā śākyaprabheṇa ca bhoṭa bhāṣāyām vipariṇamayya saṃśodhya ca vinyastaḥ
